roleset.name: seize, take into custody
roleset.note: APPREHEND-V NOTES: No appropriate Vncls. Vncls comprehend-87.2-1 matches a different sense for which there is not PB frame at this point. (from apprehend.01-v)
APPREHENSION-N NOTES: Based on ontonouns. Comparison with apprehend.01. Framed by Katie. (from apprehension.02-n)

example.name: apprehend-v: Passive
example.text: Immediately after the interview, he-1 was apprehended *-1 again by the Jordanian authority.

example.name: apprehend-v
example.text: Do you apprehend that this would occur ?

example.name: apprehension-n
example.text: The formal developments of Chapter 8 will facilitate a more precise apprehension of the concept.

roleset.name: fear, anxiety
roleset.note: APPREHENSION-N NOTES: Based on Sharp data. No Comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from apprehension.01-n)

role.descr: fearful of or about; misgiving; cause

example.name: apprehension-n: With the cause only - petallar apprehension tests look for anxiety in a patient due to the movement of the patella
example.text: No patellar apprehension, with smooth tracking
